SEARCH
Package com.axelor.utils.helpers

Class CriteriaHelper

java.lang.Object
com.axelor.utils.helpers.CriteriaHelper
public class CriteriaHelper extends Object
CriteriaHelper is a utility class that provides methods to manipulate Criteria API in a more convenient way.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    static class 
    CriteriaHelper.Builder<R,Q>
    Builder class for creating queries with filters.

      long the count of elements of type T

    • fetch

      public static <M extends com.axelor.db.Model> Optional<M> fetch(Class<M> modelClass)
      Fetch the single record of the given model class if there's only one in the database. Else, return an empty Optional.
      Type Parameters:
      M - The model type
      Parameters:
      modelClass - The model class
      Returns:
      T the element of type T from modelClass if there's only one, else null

    • builder

      public static <R extends com.axelor.db.Model, Q> CriteriaHelper.Builder<R,Q> builder(Class<R> rootClass, Class<Q> queryClass)
      Create a new CriteriaHelper.Builder instance for the given root model class and query result class.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The root model type
      Q - The query result type
      Parameters:
      rootClass - The root model class. Define on which model class to apply the query.
      queryClass - The query result class. Define the type of the result.
      Returns:
      CriteriaHelper.Builder instance
